settings.question: Email us
settings.answer:
The best way of contacting us is via email : hello@finisterre.com 

Our Customer Service team is here on hand to answer your queries Monday-Friday 8.00am - 5.30pm.

We will endeavour to respond to your email within 2-3 working days.

settings.question: Call us
settings.answer:
If you'd prefer to give us a call, you can catch us on 01872 554481. 

Our Customer Service team is here on hand to answer your queries Monday-Friday 8.00am - 5.30pm

settings.question: Returns
